Tectonic_Assault.display_help: Pendragon's attacks become so strong, the ground underneath him trembles with every strike.

Defensive_Sweep.display_help: You quickly strike your opponent from a defensive position, causing smashing damage. The force of the blow also has a chance to slow their response time. Additionally, your chance to hit and your defense against melee and smashing attacks is increased for a short time.
Defensive_Sweep.display_short_help: Melee, Minor DMG(Smashing), +DEF(Self, Melee, Smashing), +ToHit(Self), Chance for -Rech(Foe)
Defensive_Sweep.display_target_help: Your attack speed has been reduced.

messages.display_attacker_hit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.
You have gained 1 Rage!
Your attack speed has been reduced by {PlayerSource}'s {PowerName}.

Crushing_Blow.display_help: You swing your weapon at your target with tremendous force. The blow causes smashing damage and internal trauma, which causes lethal damage over time. The target also suffers a reduction in movement speed and ability to fly.
Crushing_Blow.display_target_help: You are bleeding internally. Your movement speed and your ability to fly have been reduced.

messages.display_attacker_hit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.

messages.display_attacker_hit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage over time.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage over time.
You are temporarily unable to fly due to {PlayerSource}'s {PowerName}.
You have gained 1 Rage!

Shockwave_Strike.display_help: You swing your weapon in a wide arc and create a shockwave which travels in the direction of your target. Opponents hit by the shockwave suffer smashing damage. Targets may also be knocked back and suffer a brief reduction in their regeneration and recovery.
Shockwave_Strike.display_target_help: You have been knocked back and suffer exhaustion, reducing your regeneration and recovery.

messages.display_attacker_hit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.
You have gained 1 Rage!

messages.display_attacker_hit: You knock {PlayerDest} off their feet with your {PowerName}!
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} knocks you off your feet with their {PowerName}!

Taunt.display_help: Taunts a foe, and some nearby foes, to attack you. Useful for pulling villains off an ally who find themselves in over their head. Taunted foes tend to ignore other Heroes and focus on you for quite a while, so use this power cautiously. A To Hit check is required to Taunt enemy players, but is not needed against critter targets. Recharge: Slow

messages.display_attacker_hit: Your {PowerName} hit, and you Taunt {PlayerDest} to attack you.
messages.display_victim_hit: {Playersource} hit you with their {Powername}. You have been Taunted!

Follow_Through.display_help: You channel your energy into an especially powerful swing. This swing does significant smashing damage and causes sufficient trauma to induce lethal damage due to internal bleeding.
Follow_Through.display_short_help: Melee, Superior DMG (Smashing), Moderate DoT (Lethal), Chance for Knockup(Foe), -Fly(Foe)
Follow_Through.display_target_help: You have been knocked back and suffer exhaustion, reducing your regeneration and recovery.

messages.display_attacker_hit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.

messages.display_attacker_hit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage over time.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage over time.
You have gained 1 Rage!

messages.display_attacker_hit: You knock {PlayerDest} off their feet with your {PowerName}!
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} knocks you off your feet with their {PowerName}!

Shatter_Armor.display_help: You batter your enemy with your weapon, causing significant smashing damage and temporarily debilitating their defenses and resistances.
Shatter_Armor.display_target_help: Your defenses and resistances have been decreased.

messages.display_attacker_hit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.
You have gained 1 Rage!

Arc_of_Devastation.display_help: You swing your weapon in a powerful arc which deals smashing damage to all in the way. There is also a chance that the target may be knocked down and stunned. If stunned, the opponent will also suffer reductions in attack speed and recharge rate.
Arc_of_Devastation.display_short_help: Melee (Cone), High DMG(Smashing), Chance for Knockback(Foe), Stun(Foe), -Rech(Foe), -ToHit(Foe)
Arc_of_Devastation.display_target_help: Your attack speed and chance to hit have been reduced.

messages.display_attacker_hit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.
You have gained 1 Rage!

messages.display_attacker_hit: You knock {PlayerDest} off their feet with your {PowerName}!
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} knocks you off your feet with their {PowerName}!
{PlayerSource} Stuns you with their {PowerName}.

Power_of_the_Fae.display_help: When Pendragon reaches 100 Rage, he taps into the power of the Fae realm, granting him protection from damage and empowering his sword with Mystic energies.
Power_of_the_Fae.display_attacker_attack_floater: Pendragon calls on the power of the Fae!

messages.display_attacker_hit: You tap into your inner strength with your {PowerName} and are more accurate and more deadly for a short while.

messages.display_victim_hit: You have gained 1 Rage!
You have gained 1 Rage!

Mystic_Destruction.display_help: You swing your weapon in a powerful arc which deals smashing damage to all in the way. There is also a chance that the target may be knocked down and stunned. If stunned, the opponent will also suffer reductions in attack speed and recharge rate.
Mystic_Destruction.display_short_help: Melee (Cone), High DMG(Smashing), Chance for Knockback(Foe), Stun(Foe), -Rech(Foe), -ToHit(Foe)
Mystic_Destruction.display_target_help: Your attack speed and chance to hit have been reduced.
Mystic_Destruction.display_attacker_attack_floater: Pendragon releases the power of his Fae shield!

messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} strikes you with {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Mystic damage!

messages.display_attacker_hit: You knock {PlayerDest} off their feet with your {PowerName}!
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} knocks you off your feet with their {PowerName}!
